name: VoiceTone Harmony-G XT
details:
Vocal and guitar effects processorRiveting Vocal Harmony & FX For Guitarists
• Creates stunning, natural harmonies by automatically listening to your guitar and voice
• Tone switch adapts to your voice to make you sound crisp, clean and full
• 18 combinations of reverb & delay shared by vocal and guitar input
